body_html: I'm not sure what's going on in this change. It's changing the BatchNorm code path in C++, but stats will still be half on the Python side? Also, it's going to conflict with @ezyang's changes (to no longer use THVoidTensor)
body_text: I'm not sure what's going on in this change. It's changing the BatchNorm code path in C++, but stats will still be half on the Python side? Also, it's going to conflict with @ezyang's changes (to no longer use THVoidTensor)
body: I'm not sure what's going on in this change. It's changing the BatchNorm code path in C++, but stats will still be half on the Python side? Also, it's going to conflict with @ezyang's changes (to no longer use `THVoidTensor`)
